# foxcon_schema_registry_normalization (Data Source)

Reads schema registry normalization value.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "foxcon_schema_registry_normalization" "test" {
  rest_endpoint = "http://localhost:8081"
  credentials {
    key    = "admin"
    secret = "admin-secret"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `credentials` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--credentials))
- `rest_endpoint` (String) The REST endpoint of the Schema Registry cluster.

### Read-Only

- `normalization_enabled` (Boolean) Normalization value

<a id="nestedblock--credentials"></a>
### Nested Schema for `credentials`

Optional:

- `key` (String) The Schema Registry API Key.
- `secret` (String, Sensitive) The Schema Registry API Secret.
